resources.string: There are empty values. Title, author, year, publisher and category are required fields.

1. How to add books? 
Click on the orange floating button. A form will open. Complete the form, all fields are required, except your personal evaluation. You can modified it later.
 
 
 2. How to delete books? 
There are two ways for delete books:
 2.1 Delete book with card long press: long press on the respective card book to delete. A dialog will open with to options, select "Delete" for delete or "Cancel" for cancel the operation.
 2.2 Delete on the book view: click on the respective card book. A view with book information will open, click in the expand menu (top-right of the toolbar). You will see a option for delete the book that you have select before
 
 
 3. How to modify personal evaluation? 
 Click on the respective card book. A view with book information will open, click at pencil icon for modify your book personal evaluation.
